MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL41 postcode area of Blaenau Ffestiniog, affecting properties in Cromwell Street, Leeds Street, and the surrounding area. We are aware of the previous power cut affecting your area and we apologise for this. Our engineers are on site to investigate and repair the fault. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 1:00 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:13 pm on 13th October, 2020.
